message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1200000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product worth $1500000 at a highly favorable rate. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you've placed on this product, but I'm looking to stay within a budget of $1000000. To start the conversation, I'd like to offer $1050000. This reflects the value I see in the product while remaining within my financial constraints. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budgetary concerns and am willing to negotiate further. In light of this, I am pleased to offer the product to you at $1100000. This price still reflects the high value and quality of the product, while providing a more accessible option for you. I hope this revised offer better aligns with your financial considerations. Please let me know your thoughts.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $1100000 is closer, I'm still aiming to stay within $1000000 to make this deal work for me.  To demonstrate my commitment, I'm willing to offer $1075000. This reflects a significant compromise on my part, and I'm hopeful we can reach an agreement at this price.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial solution. In consideration of your latest offer, I am willing to extend the product at $1090000. This price maintains a reasonable profit margin while reflecting the value of the product. I believe this to be a fair compromise. I look forward to your response.
Alice, we're getting close!  I'm willing to go up to $1080000.  This is a very fair compromise for both of us, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement at this point.
